scripts.copy: cpy ../../../LICENSE README.md package.json dist --flat && cpy "schemas/**" "sql/**" "*.control" "launchql.plan" "sqitch.conf" dist --parents --cwd . && sh -c 'for d in deploy verify revert; do if [ -d "$d" ]; then cp -a "$d" dist/; fi; done'
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
